# Google Cloud Redis for PHP

> Idiomatic PHP client for [Google Cloud Redis](https://cloud.google.com/redis).

[![Latest Stable Version](https://poser.pugx.org/google/cloud-redis/v/stable)](https://packagist.org/packages/google/cloud-redis) [![Packagist](https://img.shields.io/packagist/dm/google/cloud-redis.svg)](https://packagist.org/packages/google/cloud-redis)

* [Homepage](http://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-php)
* [API documentation](http://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-php/#/docs/cloud-redis/latest/redis/readme)

**NOTE:** This repository a Read-Only subtree split of
[Google Cloud PHP](https://github.com/googlecloudplatform/google-cloud-php). Any
support requests, bug reports, or development contributions should be directed to
that project. Additional tests and build information can also be found at the
parent project.

If it is not already installed, you will also require the gRPC extension. For installation instructions, [see here](https://cloud.google.com/php/grpc).

## Installation

```
$ composer require google/cloud-redis
```
